text:
In trying to include an auth class in a particular application, 
I tried to set up the "interceptors.xml" TrustedLoader "stuff".

There needs to be an example interceptors.xml added somewhere. 
 Until that shows up, it is hard to test it.
creator: tom@58k.com

text:
I'll try to add an example, right now the biggest priority is fixing the remaining bugs.

Please note that I added some fixes to automatically add classes from
modules/XXX/WEB-INF/lib/common and lib/container to the common and container 
classpaths - that should simplify things a lot.
creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com

text:
A PasswordPrompter example add-ons has been added.  Source is included in the
distribution PasswordPrompter.war file.  Documentation is limited at the
moment, but more will be added as time permits
creator: Larry.Isaacs@sas.com
